successes.title: The Searzall
successes.description: Turns a blowtorch into a hand-held supercharged instant-power broiler. Sears fish, sous-vide, pizza, cheese, foie, and everything else.

Pledges.description:
THE INSIDER
Thanks for the ten-spot! You will receive special updates available only to backers. Get exclusive information on Booker and Dax's design and development progress, new ideas, unique food and drink recipes and special offers.
THE T-SHIRT Show your support for the Searzall with a surface treatment of your own! Impress your friends with a richer finish and a more savory outer layer with a custom t-shirt!

THE EARLY BIRD
You will be one of the first people to own a Searzall, and at a special low price. Make your pledge by December 15th and receive a special Searzall holiday card stocking stuffer. Propane tank and torch-head not included (per Kickstarter rules).

THE SEARZALL
You too can own a Searzall for less than our estimated MSRP. Straight from our manufacturing facility to your kitchen. Make your pledge by December 15th and receive a special Searzall holiday card stocking stuffer. Propane tank and torch-head not included (per Kickstarter rules).

THE SEARZALL AND A T-SHIRT Own a Searzall for less than our estimated MSRP and get a custom t-shirt designed by the BDX team! Make your pledge by December 15th and receive a special Searzall holiday card stocking stuffer. Propane tank and torch-head not included (per Kickstarter rules).

THE KIT
The Searzall and the Searzall kit -- searing tray, grate and recipe book. Every self-respecting Searzall user needs a Searzall kit. Make your pledge by December 15th and receive a special Searzall holiday card stocking stuffer. Propane tank and torch-head not included (per Kickstarter rules).

THE CALL
In addition to your Searzall and the Searzall kit, Dave will give you 30 minutes of cooking advice over the phone. Make your pledge by December 15th and receive a special Searzall holiday card stocking stuffer. Propane tank and torch-head not included (per Kickstarter rules).

THE EARLY ADOPTER
25 people will receive a handmade pre-production prototype model, before anyone else gets theirs. Your feedback will help add the final refinements to the Searzall production models that everyone else will get. And you'll get one too with along with the kit. Make your pledge by December 15th and receive a special Searzall holiday card stocking stuffer. Propane tank and torch-head not included (per Kickstarter rules).

THE GOLDEN TICKET
Your day at the Booker and Dax lab in NYC will begin with a hand-seared lunch with Dave Arnold and his team. Assist in science projects and play with the Searzall and other gadgets not yet available. You will also receive a final production version of the Searzall. Make your pledge by December 15th and receive a special Searzall holiday card stocking stuffer. Propane tank and torch-head not included (per Kickstarter rules).
